translated: Elder’s Birth Stories

analyzed: subhūti vagga  anna sa sāva kattheḥ a padāna
translated: The Chapter with Subhūti🔽The Elder Annasaṁsāvaka’s Birth Story
“The One with Golden Skin, the Awakened One,
was walking along the main road;
He was like a golden water pot,
with thirty-two excellent marks.
Siddhattha, the Light of the World,
incalculable, incomparable,
I attained the highest joy
when I saw the one with teeth, the radiant one.

analyzed: sambuddham abhināmetvā  bhojayim tam mahā muni
translated: I bowed to the Awakened One,🔽and I fed that Great Sage;
The one with great compassion in the world
then gave me approval.
In that one with great compassion,
the one who gives the highest comfort,
I purified my mind with faith in the Buddha,
and for an eon I rejoiced in heaven.
For ninety-four eons
I gave that gift then;
I do not recall any bad destination,
this is the fruit of giving alms.
The four analytical insights,
and the eight liberations,
the six supernormal knowledges were realized,
and the Buddha’s instruction was fulfilled.”

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā annasaṁsāvako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmai annasasāvakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
translated: Thus have I heard. This was said by the Elder Annasaṁsāvaka.
The Story of the Elder Annasamsavaka is the fifth.
